FuncDef: The reset dns dynamic-host command deletes dynamic DNS entries saved in the domain name cache. The reset dns dynamic-host command deletes dynamic DNS entries saved in the domain name cache.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo: After confirming the action of clearing DNS entries, you can run the reset command to clear them.
